Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1966...
Traded from Coney Island to Boston (UBA) on 3/2/1966 (Going to CI: 2B L. Spradling. Going to PIL: 1B J. Marsh)...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Troy on 3/2/1968 (Going to PIL: CF B. Rodriguez. Going to TRO: C C. Davis, 1B J. Marsh)...
Had first career hit on 8/6/1968, off Clint Dunklin (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/27/1968, off Kermit Turner Jr. (PEN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1972, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1974, hitting .448 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1974, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 5/4/1975 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1977, hitting .706 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1977...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1978...
Injured on 5/20/1979 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 7/15/1979...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1979...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/23/1980 to a 6-year deal worth $5,786,624 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1980, hitting .667 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1980...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1981...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/29/1982, off Joseph Ping (Ash)...
